attributes.action: Why are Bulgarians not subjected to the same requirements to stay in the UK as British are to stay in Bulgaria,
attributes.additional_details: Proof of finance to support themselves for 1 year, pay a solicitor to produce all the paperwork,ensure they have the means for Health cover,make a statement saying that you will not ask the government for any benifits, pay to form a company to buy a house, pay for every piece of paper that is required, then pay two tax payments for the imigration department, also we are unable to find a Doctor or Dentist that will accept the IHIC,why if we choose to live in an EU country we will after 18 months loose any NHS Benifits after paying into it for over 50 years
